channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: DJI sues Department of Defense over listing as a Chinese military company
item.description: Drone-maker DJI filed a lawsuit Friday against the US Department of Defense over its inclusion on a DoD list of “Chinese military companies.” A DJI sp...

item.title: 12 Best Retro Game Consoles (2024): Evercade, Polymega, Analogue Pocket, Arcade1Up, and More
item.description: From the stylish Evercade to the old-school Sega Genesis Mini, these machines will have you bleeping, blooping, and blasting back to the good old days...

item.title: DJI Air 3S Drone Review: Price, Specs, Availability
item.description: DJI’s new midrange drone offers a dual-camera setup and beautifully simple flight performance.

item.title: 16 Best PS5 Accessories (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From extra game storage to a fancy 120-Hz TV, these WIRED-tested favorites will complement your PS5.

item.title: Analogue3D’s Retro Console Proves the N64 Controller Was the Worst Ever
item.description: Some things are better left in the past.

item.title: 14 Gifts for People Who Are Perpetually Cold (2024)
item.description: From tiny mugs to a backyard hot tub, these picks will make your loved ones feel warm and fuzzy—inside and out.

item.title: Four takeaways from Pony AI’s IPO filing

item.title: I just spent my first week ever with an EV, the Chevy Equinox — here’s what it was like
item.description: The funnest car I ever drove was the original Tesla Roadster. This was in 2011, back when Elon Musk’s EV company was courting press instead of denigra...

item.title: Former OpenAI CTO Mira Murati is reportedly fundraising for a new AI startup

item.title: What we know about the layoffs at Meta
